summary: Documentary about urban violence in Brazil, especially in Rio de Janeiro. Policemen, drug dealers, and shantytown dwellers get trapped into a daily war that knows no winners.
cast: Nilton Cerqueira|Carlos Luis Gregório|Paulo Lins|Hélio Luz|Rodrigo Pimentel|Itamar Silva
director: Directors: Kátia Lund, João Moreira Salles (as J. Moreira Salles)
title: Noticias de una guerra personal
